INTRO: Hello, I am a frontend developer from Dresden, Germany. Originally I come from the IT industry and with the help of a bootcamp I am looking for my first professional job in software development.
FACT_1: When I'm not sitting in front of a screen, I like to spend time with my partner and my dog, go to the gym or read a non-fiction book. Life is a great mix of digital pixels and personal connections. I look forward to incorporating this perspective into my work.
FACT_2: I appreciate the simplicity of everyday life and the ability to solve problems through thoughtful thinking. In the world of zeros and ones, I look for elegant solutions that are not only functional but also tailored to the end user. I study cyber security at IU as a part-time job. The constantly evolving IT landscape fascinates me and I am excited to deepen my knowledge to contribute to the security of future digital spaces.
I've acquired expertise in developing pr: I've acquired expertise in developing projects utilizing diverse frontend technologies and concepts.
